dict.string: Varicon Timesheet needs access to your Apple Music library to play audio content.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your calendar to help you track important dates and events related to Daily Cost.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your camera to allow you to take and upload photos for tracking your daily cost and update user profile.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your contacts to help you manage and track user identities within the app.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your location at all times to track user's current location in timesheet.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your location even when the app is not in use to track user's current location in timesheet.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your location while the app is in use to track user's current location in timesheet.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your microphone to allow you to record and upload audio and video content for tracking your Daily Cost.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your motion data to track the movement of your device for enhanced tracking features.
Varicon Timesheet needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload photos for tracking your Daily Cost and update user profile.
